name: xiuzhen idle
description:
place hang up, attribute growth

This is a minimalist progress bar hanging game! But it also focuses on a variety of highly growing game systems and playing methods. In the process of refining Qi, building a foundation, flying to the fairy world, and even stepping into the divine world, new play systems will be unlocked continuously.

elixir, multiple skills

Plants, gold and stones, refining utensils, alchemy, planting, controlling animals, drawing amulets... A variety of immortal cultivation techniques. It's simple without losing freedom. You can experience whether it's an orthodox way to cultivate immortals, a master of alchemy and tools, or a strange man or a strange person who catches and controls spirit beasts.

simulated operation, self built sect

After the game enters the middle stage, you can build your own sect. Although it is a simple progress bar click operation mode, it has all kinds of operation elements such as recruiting disciples with different talents, collecting development resources, building sect facilities and attacking the world.

create all things and establish the kingdom of God

After stepping through the five realms, you can start a new creative game - creating the kingdom of God. In the kingdom of God, we can start with "one Qi", breed all things, cultivate people, and challenge threats from other aspects!

unlimited challenges, Nirvana and rebirth

As time goes by, the protagonist's qualification and inferiority must be continuously improved! If you can't in this life, you will reincarnate and be reborn. You can gain talent bonus according to the cultivation in previous life, which makes the cultivation faster and easier!

blow too much, game sincerity

The above publicity text has a great element of boasting. You will find that this is a simple hang-up placement game, and there are many imperfections. But I will continue to add new play methods and content. Accept any creative ideas and improvement suggestions from you.

The whip group has not been established yet. The game will be launched as soon as possible. Friends who like this mode can wish first to give some encouragement!

English introduction is translated by computer. Don't blame me if you can't understand it
